alert.note: Alert for Inland Nueces; Jim Wells (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 13 at 5:15PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Nueces and central Jim Wells Counties through 545 PM CDT... At 514 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Banquete, or near Driscoll, moving west at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Driscoll and Agua Dulce. This includes US Highway 77 between mile markers 678 and 680. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
